page.title: 14Education in SW Hamilton
page.content: {UNDER 5's PROVISIONS Apart from the various voluntary play-groups, one of the few local authority nursery schools is situated at Cadzow Bridge (Holland Bush). {PRIMARY} The area has two RC Primary Schools with another just outside the boundary. One non-denominational school has recently been built in Woodhead. The non-Catholic children travel to school outside the area. {SECONDARY} There are no secondary schools in the area. The children over primary age have to travel some distances, the RC children split between John Ogilvie Blantyre and Holy Cross in Hamilton. The non-denominational pupils split between Earnock High and Hamilton Grammar Schools.
